content: has seen some major improvements, such as keyboard navigation, much faster cryptography and federated shared items. So it has been an unusually busy year for the project and I expect that future development is going to become less hectic and more incremental.

title: missing
content: Like a Norfolk Terrier, the fediverse continues to be a lively and more friendly companion than the

title: missing
content: which the big commercial social networks have turned into. Even if it doesn't take over the world or isn't to everyone's taste, being able to run your own small social network sites the way you want to and on low cost hardware is a victory.

title: missing
content: Epicyon is not intended to compete with Mastodon, and there are no public Epicyon instances to try. This is expected to be a self-hosted system for instances with ten user accounts or less. Don't scale up, scale out horizontally, like the rhizome.
